data.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - シナリオ「沖田畷の戦い」/Scenario "The Battle of Okitanawate"
data.detailed_description:
An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."
Following the defeat of the Otomo by the Shimazu, the Ryuzoji clan began to build up their own forces. This left the battle for Kyushu between the Shimazu and Ryuzoji clans.
Takanobu Ryuzoji, intent on punishing Harunobu Arima for his opposition, led a large force to the Shimahara peninsula. Seeing this, Yoshihisa Shimazu sends his youngest brother Iehisa to save the Arima clan.
The battle for control of Kyushu is about to begin.

▼How to use
To play, select "New Game." Then, from the scenario selection screen, select "The Battle of Okitanawate."

fullgame.name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi / 信長の野望･大志

Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7 Japanese Version 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 1.8GHz or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 over or 1280 x 720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7 Japanese Version 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 over or 1280 x 720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
